ing: 3 heads endive - washed, dried, and separated into individual leaves
1/3 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as CraisinsÂ®)
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or to taste
des: "An excellent, quick appetizer and always a hit! Cranberry or walnut balsamic vinegar is wonderful with this!"
ins:
Arrange endive leaves on a serving tray.
Stir blue cheese, cranberries, and walnuts together in a bowl. Place a small amount of the blue cheese mixture on each leaf. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar.
